reviews.review:
Fairly addictive game. I've been playing since CS 1.3.

It is very frustrating and probably my main source of stress these days. 
One of the reason is that it is somewhat hard to tell who is cheating and who is a legit superior player.
It is easy to spot when people are aiming the wall and suddenly give a headshot OR when they have a ping of 100 ms and are leading a team of decent rank players.

Having decent hardware (monitor, video card, peripherals, etc), internet connection makes a huge difference on your gameplay.

I don't ever play by myself. Currently, competitive matches are unplayable online due to kids, cheaters and trolls.
I strive to always play competitive matches with 4 other friends.
Начиная играть в эту игру, ты узнаешь много нового  о своей семье))
Dopóki macie z kim grać, mam na myśli, koleżanki lub kolegów, to granie w cs sprawia przyjemność, w momencie kiedy przyjdzie wam grać samemu, gra wyjmuje z was El DIablo, nie polecam
Ну что могу сказать - За тебя выблядки ,против тебя выблядки.
you buy a pew-pew, you shoot the other guys, explosions
Other than the cheaters and bad teammates the game has no big issues. It's enjoyable with friends and even solo when having a good team.

jogo muito bom, fez parte da infancia de muita gente e faz parte to presente de pessoas pelo mundo todo. Pena que o uso alto de cpu, faz com que um computador nao tao bom nao consiga oferecer a melhor experiencia in game.
Игра топ уже есть свой первый нож  много различных режимов

Sim, gosto muito do CSGO e o recomendaria com certeza! O único senão é a quantidade crescente de Xiters que invadiram o CSGO. Acredito que se somente contas PRIME pudessem jogar, esse número diminuiria sensivelmente....
